section.title: Control Planes and Regions
section.para: A region in OpenStack terms is a collection of URLs that together provide a consistent set of services (Nova, Neutron, Swift, etc). Regions are represented in the Keystone identity service catalog and clients can decide which region they want to use.
For the owner of a cloud, regions provide a way of segmenting resources for scale, resilience, and isolation.
In a simple single control-plane cloud, there is no need for a separate region definition and the control-plane itself can define the region name.
